summary: Monkey D. Luffy is a popular manga and anime character from the series *One Piece*. He is a young pirate captain who dreams of becoming the "King of the Pirates" by finding the legendary treasure, One Piece. Luffy accidentally ate a magical fruit that made his body like rubber, giving him unique powers. He travels the seas, fighting enemies and making friends. Luffy is known for his cheerful personality and powerful attacks, like the Gum-Gum Pistol. He comes from a family of strong mariners and is one of the most recognizable anime characters worldwide.
title: Monkey D. Luffy
